#include <bits/stdc++.h>

#define REP(i, n)	for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
#define REPN(i, n)	for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)
#define SET(i, n)	memset(i, n, sizeof(i))

#define MAX			100050

using namespace std;

int main(){
	int tc, n;
	char s[5];
	scanf("%d", &tc);
	while(tc--){
		scanf("%d", &n);
		int aa = 0, ab = 0, ba = 0, bb = 0;
		REP(i, n){
			scanf("%s", s);
			if(s[0] == 'a' && s[1] == 'a') aa++;
			if(s[0] == 'a' && s[1] == 'b') ab++;
			if(s[0] == 'b' && s[1] == 'a') ba++;
			if(s[0] == 'b' && s[1] == 'b') bb++;
		}
		REP(i, aa/2) printf("aa");
		REP(i, min(ab, ba)) printf("ab");
		REP(i, bb/2) printf("bb");
		if(aa % 2) printf("aa");
		else if(bb % 2) printf("bb");
		REP(i, bb/2) printf("bb");
		REP(i, min(ab, ba)) printf("ba");
		REP(i, aa/2) printf("aa");
		printf("\n");
	}
	return 0;
}
